# Discussion 15 Section - 12.3 Exerecise 15 (pg 711)

**In Exercises 9 - 26, find fx, fy, fxx, fyy, fxy and fyx.**

15. $f(x,y) = sin(x)cos(y)$
```{r}
fxy <- expression(sin(x) * cos(y))
```
fx
```{r}
D(fxy, 'x')
```
fy
```{r}
D(fxy, 'y')
```
fxx
```{r}
D(D(fxy, 'x'),'x')
```
fyy
```{r}
D(D(fxy, 'y'),'y')
```
fxy
```{r}
D(D(fxy, 'x'),'y')
```
fyx
```{r}
D(D(fxy, 'y'),'x')
```
